Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.datalake

Class ParticipantDataLakeManager

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.datalake.ParticipantDataLakeManager
public class ParticipantDataLakeManager extends Object
This class represents a DataLakeManager for data in projects. The Data is ordered as follows: Project - participantID1 - <taskID> - <step> (a number) - localFileName - <step> (a number) - localFileName - <taskID> - <step> (a number) - localFileName ... - participantID2 ...
Author:
Thomas Pfau

  • Method Details

    • storeParticipantData

      public io.vertx.core.Future<String> storeParticipantData(String participantID, int step, String taskID, io.vertx.ext.web.FileUpload upload)
      Write an element to into the dataLake. The actual location in the dataLake is defined by the task ID and the participant ID. Data will be stored in the following scheme (to be able to quickly download all data for a project): studyID / participantID / step / taskID / filesForTask.format This allows a quick removal of all data for a participant by deleting the respective participantID folder.
      Parameters:
      participantID - the participant for which to store the data
      step - the step for the data
      taskID - the task for which data is stored.
      upload - The fileUpload containing the data
      Returns:
      A Future of the version used

    • deleteParticipantData

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> deleteParticipantData(Participant p)
      Delete a participant from a study. This will remove the participant data from the project.
      Parameters:
      p - the participant for which to store the data
      Returns:
      A Future indicating whether the deletion was successful (if it succeeded)

    • getFile

      public DataLakeFile getFile(ParticipantFileResult result)
      Get a File from a TaskFileResult
      Parameters:
      result - the result for which to obtain the file location in the datalake
      Returns:
      The corresponding DataLakeFile
